backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Nebacrypt backend, defining data types (ProjectSubmission, UserProfile, Message) and implementing project submission management, user profile CRUD, access control, and blob storage via mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single implemented feature: updating the Nebacrypt logo banner image in the Footer component to display without cropping using full-width styling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of frontend source files to short summaries describing each component's purpose, used as build planning reference documentation.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Norwegian language, SEO meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter Card metadata, a favicon, and a root div that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing page navigation, scroll targeting, authentication state, loading screen display, and conditional profile setup modal rendering within a ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying the Nebacrypt logo banner at full width without cropping, company contact details, copyright notice, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky responsive navigation header with Internet Identity login/logout, dynamic nav items (including admin link), mobile hamburger menu, and active state management.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Full-screen loading overlay showing the Nebacrypt logo with a pulse animation, a spinning ring, and the Norwegian text 'Laster inn...'.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects name, email, and optional company from new users to create their profile, using the useCreateUserProfile mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/PublicSubmission: A public-facing project submission form that collects client details, project description, timeline, and budget, with a success state and an Internet Identity login section.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile CRUD, project submission, and messaging, with cache invalidation helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining a Nordic-themed color palette with CSS custom properties for both light and dark modes, plus utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that displays all project submissions in a table, allows status management (reviewed, followup, inProgress, completed), messaging, and delivery link management. Uses multiple React Query hooks and renders dialogs for detailed submission views.
frontend/src/pages/ClientPortal.tsx: Client-facing portal page where authenticated users (via Internet Identity) can submit projects, view their project statuses with badges, and exchange messages with admins. Includes login/logout flow and a public submission form component.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page for Nebacrypt displaying a hero section, services cards, and a 'why choose us' section with smooth scroll support for services and contact sections via props.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module providing functions to read URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, persist them in sessionStorage, and clean sensitive params from the URL hash without page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with OKLCH-based design tokens for colors, custom border radii, accordion keyframe animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking schema version, existing features, and a fix request to update the Nebacrypt footer logo image width to prevent cropping.
